sources.title: Private Snuffy Smith
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Private Snuffy Smith
sources.description: Comic strip mountain man, Snuffy Smith joins the Army.

sources.title: Private Snuffy Smith (1942) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Bud Duncan, Edgar Kennedy, Sarah Padden
 Director: Edward F. Cline

 A moonshining hillbilly grown tired of dodging revenue agents, decides to join the army and their offer of free clothes, food and $21.00 a month. He soon gets fed up with army discipline and heads back to Smokey Mountain, but is followed closely by the enemy agents! Based on comic strip "Barney Google and Snuffy Smith" by Billy DeBeck.

sources.title: Private Snuffy Smith (1942) Comedy, War Full Length Movie
sources.description:
IT'S BODACIOUS! America's favorite comic strip leaps to hilarious life on the screen...with the peskiest, sassiest varmit ever to wear cacky britches!A hillbilly moonshiner enlists in the army. Monogram Pictures' comedy was inspired by the then-popular comic strip character.

Director: Edward F. Cline 
Writers: Billy DeBeck, John Grey
Stars: Bud Duncan, Edgar Kennedy, Sarah Padden 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romance, War

metadata.Plot: Snuffy Smith, moonshining hillbilly, grows tired of dodging revenue agents, headed by Cooper, and decides to take the army up on their offer of free clothes, food and $21.00 a month. Once enlisted, he finds that revenue agent Cooper is his sergeant. Don, a hillbilly soldier friend of Snuffy, has invented a range finder, but it is stolen by some fifth columnists and hidden in Snuffy's bag. Snuffy decides he has all the army discipline he cares for and heads back to Smokey Mountain, followed closely by the enemy agents.
metadata.Writer: Billy DeBeck, John Grey, Jack Henley
metadata.Actors: Bud Duncan, Edgar Kennedy, Sarah Padden
